text.__SUMMARY__:
Tillandsia hammeri is a species in the genus Tillandsia. This species is endemic to Mexico.
It is named after the renowned botanist and plantsman, active in Mexico in the late 20th and early 21st century, Gary Hammer.
text.References: Checklist of Mexican Bromeliaceae with Notes on Species Distribution and Levels of Endemism retrieved 3 November 2009
